title: "Ugandan fintech Solerchil moves to US after securing $300k pre-seed funding"
excerpt: "After securing $300,000 in pre-seed funding, Ugandan female-led food fintech, CHIL Food Centre, trading as Solerchil Technologies Uganda Ltd has now opened its headquarters in Dover city, in Delaware State in the USA as part of its initiative to scale its operations."
